Statement: DEL-03-02 is a deliverable within PKG-03 Harness Runtime Core covering SOW-004 SOW-005 SOW-006 and supporting OBJ-002.
EvidenceQuote: Package: PKG-03 Harness Runtime Core; Scope Items: SOW-004 SOW-005 SOW-006
Notes: FACT. Confirmed against decomposition deliverable table PKG-03 section.

TargetName: Implement/maintain session boot and turn execution APIs
Statement: DEL-03-02 covers SOW-004: session boot and turn execution APIs.
Notes: FACT. Decomposition scope ledger confirms SOW-004 maps to DEL-03-01 and DEL-03-02.

TargetName: Implement/maintain streaming event protocol (SSE) from runtime to UI during turns
Statement: DEL-03-02 covers SOW-005: streaming event protocol (SSE).
Notes: FACT. Decomposition scope ledger confirms SOW-005 maps to DEL-03-02 exclusively.

TargetName: Implement/maintain harness runtime responsibilities: tool calling and permissions and event streaming
Statement: DEL-03-02 covers SOW-006: harness runtime responsibilities.
Notes: FACT. Decomposition scope ledger confirms SOW-006 maps to DEL-03-02 and DEL-03-05 and DEL-03-06.

TargetName: Harness runtime correctness (sessions and turns and streaming) + Anthropic-only outbound network policy
Statement: DEL-03-02 supports OBJ-002: harness runtime correctness.
Notes: FACT. ASSUMPTION noted in Datasheet: best-effort mapping via PKG-03 grouping. Decomposition confirms OBJ-002 linkage.

Statement: A valid session must be booted (DEL-03-01) before turn execution can proceed. Session-active is a precondition for REQ-02 step 1.
EvidenceQuote: Validate that a session is active (precondition from DEL-03-01)
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Conditions (Session Active); Procedure Prerequisites; Guidance P4 table; Specification REQ-02 step 1.

Statement: DEL-03-02 accepts opts object and passes it to the runtime option mapping layer implemented by DEL-03-03. Omitted fields follow fallback chains.
EvidenceQuote: The endpoint MUST accept an opts object and pass it to the runtime option mapping layer
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Attributes (Option Fallback Chains); Guidance P4 table; Procedure Prerequisites; Specification REQ-07.

Statement: DEL-03-02 consumes governance gate pass/fail signals from DEL-03-04. When blocked the turn endpoint prevents subagent injection and allows parent to continue.
SourceRef: P5: Subagent Governance Boundary at Turn Level
EvidenceQuote: DEL-03-02 SHOULD consume governance gate outputs but SHOULD NOT implement the gate logic itself
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Specification Excluded (DEL-03-04); Datasheet Attributes (Subagent Governance); Guidance P5 directional guidance D-001.

TargetName: Anthropic Provider Integration & Key Provisioning Contract
Statement: DEL-03-02 requires the Anthropic SDK integration and API key provisioning from DEL-03-05 to execute turns against the Anthropic API.
EvidenceQuote: Anthropic provider integration available (DEL-03-05); SDK integration must be available for turn execution
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Conditions (API Key Available referencing DEL-03-05); Specification REQ-02 step 4; Guidance P4 table.

TargetName: Server-side Attachment Resolver + Prompt Mode Selection
Statement: DEL-03-02 calls the attachment resolver from DEL-04-01 for server-side validation of attachments. Partial/full failure behavior at turn level depends on resolver output.
EvidenceQuote: Resolve attachments server-side if provided (integration with DEL-04-01 resolver)
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Construction (Attachment Resolver); Procedure Prerequisites; Guidance P4 table; Specification REQ-06 and Boundary Notes.

Statement: DEL-03-02 operates within the Anthropic-only outbound network policy enforced by DEL-03-06. DEC-NET-001 constrains turn execution to Anthropic API connections only.
SourceRef: C6: Network Policy Verification Scope at Turn Level
EvidenceQuote: DEL-03-02 SHOULD NOT duplicate network enforcement logic (that is DEL-03-06 scope)
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Attributes (Network Policy DEC-NET-001); Specification Excluded (DEL-03-06); Guidance C6. Direction is UPSTREAM because policy enforcement is provided by DEL-03-06.

TargetName: UI Attachment Pipeline (Picker Preview Rollback Rehydration)
Statement: DEL-03-02 streams SSE events that the UI attachment pipeline (DEL-04-02) consumes for display. The turn endpoint produces the event stream consumed by UI components.
EvidenceQuote: UI attachment pipeline (picker preview rollback) covered by DEL-04-02
Notes: ASSUMPTION. The Specification exclusion table and Guidance Purpose section note DEL-03-02 connects to UI. The SSE stream is consumed by UI components but the explicit handover contract is not fully specified in sources.

Statement: DEL-03-02 is constrained by decision DEC-NET-001: outbound connections limited to Anthropic API only.
EvidenceQuote: Outbound connections limited to Anthropic API only (DEC-NET-001)
Notes: FACT. DEC-NET-001 is a decision in the decomposition Decision Log confirmed as applicable to this deliverable.

TargetName: Target platform: macOS 15+ Apple Silicon only
Statement: DEL-03-02 operates on the target platform defined by DEC-PLAT-001: macOS 15+ Apple Silicon only.
Notes: FACT. DEC-PLAT-001 is a decision in the decomposition Decision Log confirmed as applicable to this deliverable.
